NAEB RADIO NETWORK
27
PROGRAM OFFERING
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: THE DEAD SEA SCROLLS
Type: Illustrated Lecture
Time: 29:30
No.: 15 programs
Origin: WHA (Grant-in-Aid)
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 57-21
Release Date: Issue 14 (April 7)
This series has as its object the exploration of the content, meaning and significance
of the Dead Sea Scrolls, described by leading authorities as the most precious manu¬
script discoveries of modern times. The series is being planned and presented by
Dr. Menahem Mansoor, an outstanding Biblical scholar who now occupies the chair of
Hebrew Studies at the University of Wisconsin.
Since the material used on these programs is timely (new evidence is coming to light
every day), we suggest that you schedule this series for broadcast as soon as possible.
There is so much new evidence that the original plan for ten programs has been
expanded into fifteen programs which are now in production.
Since the programs are now in production, we do not have definite titles for them.
However, the above should help to explain the general content, and, as far as pro¬
duction is concerned, we are sure all of you are familiar with the work of WHA on
the strength of that station1s past contributions to Network programming.
When definite titles are learned we shall pass them on to you.
